name: Damage Formula
desc: The Damage Formula is a calculation of all the elements that damage involves. It's a complex operation that requires the consideration of many things.

value.name: Elemental Reactions
value.desc:
Elemental Reactions represent the centerpiece of the combat system of Genshin Impact. Understanding and mastering these interactions can drastically improve one’s proficiency in battle.

There are multiple factors to consider when triggering Elemental Reactions, such as aura, trigger, decay, etc. Elemental Gauge Theory and Internal Cooldowns will play a major role to help players understand the complexity behind Elemental Reactions.

imgDesc.text: Amplifying and Additive Reactions have a special element in the Damage Formula.
Transformative Reactions have a special Damage Formula for the calculation.
Some of the damage buffs will show a specific icon above the character HP bar.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff73>Transformative Reactions are: Bloom, Hyperbloom, Burgeon, Burning, Overloaded, Electro-charged, Superconduct, Shattered, Swirl.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Transformative Reactions ignore enemy DEF but are affected by</color> <color=#ffffff>enemy RES</color> <color=#ffffff73>. They cannot CRIT (besides Nahida's Constellation 2 which allows Bloom, Hyperbloom, Burgeon and Burning to CRIT with a set amount of 20% CRIT Rate and 100% CRIT Damage).</color> O <color=#ffffff73>nly the</color> <color=#ffffff>triggering character's Level and EM</color> <color=#ffffff73>matters.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Ex: If Bloom is triggered by a Dendro character (applying Dendro on Hydro), the Dendro character's Level and EM are considered, and the enemy Dendro RES.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Thus Transformative Reactions are calculated by the following formula:</color>

<color=#ffffff>Enemy RES Multiplier × Reaction Multiplier × Character LVL Multiplier ×</color>
<color=#ffffff>(100% + EM Bonus Multiplier + Reaction Bonus)</color>
Reaction Multiplier

<color=#ffffff73>Each Transformative Reaction has its own Reaction Multiplier, as shown in the table:</color>
<color=#ffffff>Reaction Multiplier</color>
<color=#ffffff>Reaction</color>
<color=#ffffff73>300%</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Burgeon, Hyperbloom, Shattered</color>
275%
Overloaded
<color=#ffffff73>200%</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Bloom, Electro-charged</color>
<color=#ffffff73>60%</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Swirl</color>
<color=#ffffff73>25%</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Burning</color>
Character Level Multiplier

<color=#ffffff73>Characters have Level Multipliers depending on the character's current level. It is as shown in the table:</color>
<color=#ffffff>Character Level</color>
<color=#ffffff>Character Level Multiplier</color>
<color=#ffffff73>60</color>
<color=#ffffff73>492.88</color>
<color=#ffffff73>70</color>
<color=#ffffff73>765.64</color>
<color=#ffffff73>80</color>
<color=#ffffff73>1077.44</color>
<color=#ffffff73>85</color>
<color=#ffffff73>1253.84</color>
<color=#ffffff73>90</color>
<color=#ffffff73>1446.85</color>
EM Bonus Multiplier

<color=#ffffff73>For EM Bonus Multiplier, only the triggering character's total EM as shown in the Stat page is accounted for.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>It is calculated as follows:</color>
<color=#ffffff>EM×16 / EM+2000</color>
Reaction Bonus
<color=#ffffff73>There are some Reaction Bonus for the Transformative Reaction damage:</color>
<color=#ffffff>Characters</color>

customize.name: Mona
customize.desc: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>1st Constellation</color>
When any of your own party members hits an opponent affected by an Omen, the effects of <color=#80c0ff>Hydro-related Elemental Reactions</color> are enhanced for 8s.

customize.name: Nilou
customize.desc: The star of the Zubayr Theater. She is full of warmth and innocence, and her dances are lively and elegant.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
Every 1,000 points of Nilou's Max HP above 30,000 will cause the DMG dealt by Bountiful Cores created by characters affected by Golden Chalice's Bounty to increase by 9%. The maximum increase in Bountiful Core DMG that can be activated this way is 400%.

customize.name: Kaveh
customize.desc: A renowned architect from Sumeru who perhaps cares a bit too much about too many things. He is an aesthete troubled by reality.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Burst</color>
When Kaveh's Burst is active, it increases Kaveh's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack AoE, and converts his attack DMG to <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> that cannot be overridden, and all Dendro Cores created by all your own party members through Bloom reactions will deal additional DMG when they burst.
<color=#ffffff>4th Constellation</color>
Dendro Cores created from Bloom reactions Kaveh triggers will deal 60% more DMG when they burst.

customize.name: Baizhu
customize.desc: The owner of Bubu Pharmacy, who is rarely seen without the white snake named Changsheng. His medicinal knowledge is encyclopedic, and his personal intrigues subtle.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
Characters who are healed by <color=#ffd780>Seamless Shields</color> will gain the Year of Verdant Favor effect: Each 1,000 Max HP that Baizhu possesses that does not exceed 50,000 will increase the Burning, Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon reaction DMG dealt by these characters by 2%, and will increase the DMG Bonus provided by Aggravate and Spread by 0.8%. This effect lasts 6s.

customize.name: Ifa
customize.desc: A vet from the Flower-Feather Clan who cherishes the life he leads alongside all manner of living things — people, animals, you name it.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>1st Ascension passive</color>
When Ifa is in the Nightsoul's Blessing state, every 1 Nightsoul point out of the total in his entire party will grant him 1 <color=#ffd780>Rescue Essentials</color> point. Rescue Essentials will increase the Swirl and Electro-Charged DMG dealt by all nearby party members. Max 150 points. Each Rescue Essentials point Ifa has will increase the Swirl and Electro-charged DMG dealt by nearby party members by 1.5%. These points will be cleared when his Nightsoul's Blessing state ends.
<color=#ffffff>2nd Constellation</color>
When Ifa is in the Nightsoul's Blessing state, every Nightsoul point the party has above a total of 60 will grant Ifa 4 additional Rescue Essentials points.
Additionally, Ifa's Rescue Essentials limit is increased by 50.
<color=#ffffff>Artifacts</color>

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged and Superconduct by 40%.

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
Increases Overloaded and Burning, and Burgeon DMG by 40%.

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
The equipping character's Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon reaction DMG are increased by 40%. Additionally, after the equipping character triggers Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, they will gain another 25% bonus to the effect mentioned prior. Each stack of this lasts 10s. Max 4 stacks simultaneously.

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
Increases Swirl DMG by 60%.
The Damage Formula

There are nine types of damage: seven of them are Elemental damage, one Physical damage, and one called True damage (that ignores the DEF, the RES and the Damage taken multiplier).
The <color=#ffffff>Damage Formula</color> is:

<color=#ffffff>Damage =</color>
<color=#ffffff>= [ ( Base Damage × Base Damage Multiplier ) + Additive Base Damage Bonus ] ×</color>
<color=#ffffff>× Enemy DEF Multiplier × Enemy RES Multiplier ×</color>
<color=#ffffff>× Damage Bonus Multiplier</color>
Base Damage

The first element to consider is the <color=#ffffff>attribute</color> the ability takes (Max HP, ATK, DEF, EM) and the <color=#ffffff>percentage</color> taken from them (higher depending on the level).
Take for example Dehya's Elemental Skill.

<color=#ffffff>Lv. 1</color>
<color=#ffffff>Lv. 10</color>
<color=#ffffff>Indomitable Flame DMG</color>
<color=#ffffff73>112.90% ATK</color>
<color=#ffffff73>203.20% ATK</color>
<color=#ffffff>Raging Flame DMG</color>
<color=#ffffff73>132.80% ATK</color>
<color=#ffffff73>239% ATK</color>
<color=#ffffff>Field DMG</color>
<color=#ffffff73>60.2% ATK</color>
<color=#ffffff73>+</color>
<color=#ffffff73>1.03% HP</color>
<color=#ffffff73>108.4% ATK</color>
<color=#ffffff73>+</color>
<color=#ffffff73>1.86% HP</color>
Some abilities (like Dehya's Field DMG) consider more than one attribute. In that case, the Base Damage is the sum of them.
Base Damage Multiplier and Additive Base Damage Bonus

There are some multipliers that directly affect the Base Damage after its calculation.
The <color=#ffffff>Base Damage Multipliers</color> are:

customize.name: Yoimiya
customize.desc: Owner of Naganohara Fireworks. Known as "Queen of the Summer Festival," she excels in her craft of creating fireworks that symbolize people's hopes and dreams.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Skill</color>
During the duration of Yoimiya's skill, her normal attack DMG will be increased.

customize.name: Traveler (Electro)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>6th Constellation</color>
Every 2 Falling Thunder attacks triggered by the Traveler's Burst will greatly increase the DMG dealt by the next Falling Thunder, which will deal 200% of its original DMG.

customize.name: Xingqiu
customize.desc: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Constellation</color>
Throughout the duration of Xingqiu's Burst, the DMG dealt by his Elemental Skill is increased by 50%.

customize.name: Wanderer
customize.desc: A wayfaring figure whose identity is a mystery. He dresses like a mountain ascetic, but he certainly does not act the part.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Skill</color>
During Wanderer's skill, when he uses Normal and Charged Attacks, the DMG they deal and their AoE will be increased.

customize.name: Wriothesley
customize.desc: Duke of the Fortress of Meropide, Lord Incognito of the murky depths.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Skill</color>
During Wriothesley's skill, when his HP is above 50%, it will enhance the Repelling Fists of his Normal Attack and increase its DMG.

customize.name: Neuvillette
customize.desc: The Chief Justice of Fontaine, known as the Iudex, is renowned for his unassailable impartiality.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>1st Ascension passive</color>
Past Draconic Glories stacks cause Neuvillette's Charged Attack to deal 110%/125%/160% of its original DMG.

customize.name: Furina
customize.desc: The absolute focus of the stage of judgment, until the final applause sounds.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Skill</color>
During Furina's Ousia-aligned skill, she summons 3 Salon Members. When they attack, if character(s) with more than 50% HP are nearby, they will increase their current attack's power based on the number of such characters, and consume said characters' HP. If the characters who meet these requirements are 1/2/3/4 (or more), the Members' attacks will deal 110%/120%/130%/140% of their original DMG.

customize.name: Navia
customize.desc: The current President of Spina di Rosula, who is lovely, dutiful, and a great boss.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Skill</color>
When Crystal Shrapnels are consumed, Navia's next elemental skill will have Rosula Shardshots added based on the number of Crystal Shrapnels. When all 11 Rosula Shardshots strike, 200% of the original amount of DMG is dealt.
In addition, when more than 3 stacks of Crystal Shrapnel are consumed, every stack consumed beyond those 3 will increase the DMG dealt by this elemental skill by an additional 15%.

After the calculation of the multiplicative bonus, there is considered an additive bonus.
The <color=#ffffff>Additive Base Damage Bonus</color> are:
Characters

customize.name: Yun Jin
customize.desc: A renowned Liyue opera singer who is skilled in both playwriting and singing. Her style is one-of-a-kind, exquisite and delicate, much like the person herself.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Burst</color>
During Yun Jin's Burst, when Normal Attack DMG is dealt to opponents, Bonus DMG will be dealt based on Yun Jin's current DEF.
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
The Normal Attack DMG Bonus granted by Yun Jin's Burst is further increased by 2.5%/5%/7.5%/11.5% of Yun Jin's DEF when the party contains characters of 1/2/3/4 Elemental Types, respectively.

customize.name: Gorou
customize.desc: The great general of Watatsumi Island's forces. He is deeply trusted by his subordinates.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
Gorou receives the following DMG Bonuses to his attacks based on his DEF:
Elemental Skill: Skill DMG increased by 156% of DEF
Elemental Burst: Skill DMG and Crystal Collapse DMG increased by 15.6% of DEF

customize.name: Thoma
customize.desc: The Kamisato Clan's housekeeper. A well-known "fixer" in Inazuma.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
DMG dealt by Thoma's Bursts Fiery Collapse is increased by 2.2% of Thoma's Max HP.

customize.name: Sayu
customize.desc: A pint-sized ninja attached to the Shuumatsuban, who always seems sleep-deprived.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>6th Constellation</color>
Each point of Sayu's Elemental Mastery will produce the following effects:
Increases the damage dealt by the Muji-Muji Daruma's attacks by 0.2% ATK. A maximum of 400% ATK can be gained via this method.

customize.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
customize.desc: The Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. All of the island's affairs are at this young lady's fingertips.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Burst</color>
During her Burst, Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack, Charged Attack, and Bake-Kurage DMG are increased based on her Max HP.
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
During Kokomi's Burst, the Normal and Charged Attack DMG Bonus Sangonomiya Kokomi gains based on her Max HP will receive a further increase based on 15% of her Healing Bonus.

customize.name: Shenhe
customize.desc: An adepti disciple with a most unusual air about her. Having spent much time cultivating in isolation in Liyue's mountains, she has become every bit as cool and distant as the adepti themselves.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Skill</color>
During Shenhe's skill effect, when Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts deal Cryo DMG to opponents, the DMG dealt is increased based on Shenhe's current ATK.

customize.name: Hu Tao
customize.desc: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>2nd Constellation</color>
Increases the Blood Blossom DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.

customize.name: Arataki Itto
customize.desc: The first and greatest head of the Arataki Gang, famed throughout Inazuma City's Hanamizaka... Wait, what? You've never heard of them? Are you trying to be funny here?

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
Arataki Kesagiri DMG is increased by 35% of Arataki Itto's DEF.

customize.name: Zhongli
customize.desc: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
Zhongli deals bonus DMG based on his Max HP:
· Normal Attack, Charged Attack, and Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 1.39% of Max HP.
· Skill's Stone Stele, resonance, and hold DMG is increased by 1.9% of Max HP.
· Burst's DMG is increased by 33% of Max HP.

customize.name: Albedo
customize.desc: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>2nd Constellation</color>
Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's skill grant him Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
· Unleashing his Burst consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Albedo's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.

customize.name: Kuki Shinobu
customize.desc: The capable and reliable deputy leader of the "Arataki Gang." Please note: capable and reliable are not appellations for the "Arataki Gang," but for their deputy leader in specific.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
Shinobu's skill abilities will be boosted based on her Elemental Mastery:
· Healing amount will be increased by 75% of Elemental Mastery.
· DMG dealt is increased by 25% of Elemental Mastery.

customize.name: Cyno
customize.desc: The General Mahamatra in charge of supervising the researchers of the Akademiya. It is said that when he gets down to work, the General Mahamatra is even more efficient than the "Great Vayuvyastra" made by the Kshahrewar.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
Cyno's DMG values will be increased based on his Elemental Mastery as follows:
· Pactsworn Pathclearer's Normal Attack DMG is increased by 150% of his Elemental Mastery.
· Duststalker Bolt DMG from his Passive Talent Featherfall Judgment is increased by 250% of his Elemental Mastery.

customize.name: Layla
customize.desc: A Rtawahist student who specializes in Theoretical Astrology. Heavily prone to somnambulism and locked in a grinding war with sleep deprivation, the problem of restful slumber is a most troubling one to her.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
The DMG dealt by the Shooting Stars fired by Layla's skill is increased by 1.5% of Layla's Max HP.
<color=#ffffff>4th Constellation</color>
When Layla's skill starts to fire off Shooting Stars, it will grant all nearby party members the Dawn Star effect, causing their Normal and Charged Attack DMG to increase based on 5% of Layla's Max HP.

customize.name: Faruzan
customize.desc: A researcher from "one hundred years ago." She enjoys self-identifying as everyone's senior, and has significant knowledge of ancient scripts and machines of all kinds.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
When characters affected by Faruzan's Burst's' Prayerful Wind's Gift deal Anemo DMG using Normal, Charged, Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, or Elemental Bursts to opponents, they will gain the Hurricane Guard effect: This DMG will be increased based on 32% of Faruzan's Base ATK.

customize.name: Wanderer
customize.desc: A wayfaring figure whose identity is a mystery. He dresses like a mountain ascetic, but he certainly does not act the part.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>1st Constellation</color>
During Wanderer's skill, the wind arrows fired by the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" will deal an additional 25% of his ATK as DMG.

customize.name: Dehya
customize.desc: A member of the Eremites, a mercenary organization that roams the sands of Sumeru. Valiant and powerful, she enjoys great fame amongst her fellow Eremites.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>1st Constellation</color>
Dehya's Max HP is increased by 20%, and she deals bonus DMG based on her Max HP when using the following attacks:
· Skill DMG will be increased by 3.6% of her Max HP.
· Burst DMG will be increased by 6% of her Max HP.

customize.name: Baizhu
customize.desc: The owner of Bubu Pharmacy, who is rarely seen without the white snake named Changsheng. His medicinal knowledge is encyclopedic, and his personal intrigues subtle.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>6th Constellation</color>
Increases the DMG dealt by Baizhu's Burst's Spiritveins by 8% of Baizhu's Max HP.

customize.name: Lyney
customize.desc: A famed Fontainian magician who possesses great stage presence as well as gift of the gab. Audiences are enthralled by his exquisite skills, and they hang on to his every clever word.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>1st Ascension passive</color>
If Lyney consumes HP when firing off a Prop Arrow, the Grin-Malkin hat summoned by the arrow will, upon hitting an opponent, increase DMG dealt by 80% of his ATK.

customize.name: Traveler (Hydro)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
If HP has been consumed via Suffusion while using the Hold Mode Skill, the Torrent Surge at the skill's end will deal Bonus DMG equal to 45% of the total HP the Traveler has consumed in this skill use via Suffusion. The maximum DMG Bonus that can be gained this way is 5,000.

customize.name: Xianyun
customize.desc: One of the Mighty and Illuminated Adepti of Jueyun, known as "Cloud Retainer." Expert in all kinds of mechanical contraptions, her heart now turns towards the affairs of the mortal world, through which she walks under the name "Xianyun."

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
When the Starwicker created by Xianyun's Burst has Adeptal Assistance stacks, nearby active characters' Plunging Attack shockwave DMG will be increased by 200% of Xianyun's ATK. The maximum DMG increase that can be achieved this way is 9,000.
<color=#ffffff>2nd Constellation</color>
When the Starwicker created by Stars Gather at Dusk has Adeptal Assistance stacks, nearby active characters' Plunging Attack shockwave DMG will be increased by 400% of Xianyun's ATK. The maximum DMG increase that can be achieved this way is 18,000.

customize.name: Chiori
customize.desc: The owner of Chioriya Boutique. A tailor renowned throughout Fontaine.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>6th Constellation</color>
After triggering a follow-up effect of the Passive Talent "Tailor-Made," the DMG dealt by Chiori's own Normal Attacks is increased by an amount equal to 235% of her own DEF.

customize.name: Arlecchino
customize.desc: "The Knave," Fourth of the Fatui Harbingers. A poised, ruthless diplomat. To the children in the House of the Hearth, she is their feared yet dependable "Father."

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Normal Attack</color>
When in the "Masque of the Red Death" state, Arlecchino's Normal Attacks will deal extra DMG to opponents on hit that scales off her ATK multiplied by a certain ratio of her current Bond of Life percentage.
<color=#ffffff>6th Constellation</color>
The DMG of Balemoon Rising is increased by Arlecchino's ATK multiplied by 700% of Arlecchino's current Bond of Life percentage.

customize.name: Sethos
customize.desc: The Temple of Silence's heir. Burdened with secrets, he comes from the sands.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Burst</color>
Perform a secret rite, entering the "Twilight Meditation" state, during which Sethos's Normal Attacks will be converted into enemy-piercing Dusk Bolts: Deal Electro DMG to opponents in its path, with DMG increased based on Sethos's Elemental Mastery.
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
Sethos gains the "Scorching Sandshade" effect, increasing the DMG dealt by Shadowpiercing Shots by 700% of Sethos's Elemental Mastery.

customize.name: Sigewinne
customize.desc: A Melusine and the Fortress of Meropide's head nurse. She cares equally for every convict locked in the undersea prison.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>1st Ascension passive</color>
Sigewinne grants herself the "Semi-Strict Bedrest" effect for 18s after using <color=#ffd780>Rebound Hydrotherapy</color> : Sigewinne gains an 8% <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG Bonus</color> and 10 stacks of Convalescence. When the Elemental Skills of your nearby off-field party members other than Sigewinne deal DMG, consume 1 stack of Convalescence, and increase the DMG dealt by this instance of Elemental Skill DMG. Every 1,000 Max HP Sigewinne has above 30,000 increases the DMG by 80. The maximum DMG increase for Elemental Skills that can be gained in this way is 2,800.

customize.name: Emilie
customize.desc: A Fontainian perfumer, one who bottles secrets.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>6th Constellation</color>
After using her Elemental Skill or Burst, Emilie will gain Abiding Fragrance for 5s. While this is active, the DMG dealt by her Normal and Charged Attacks will be increased by 300% of Emilie's ATK.

customize.name: Mualani
customize.desc: A well-known guide in Natlan who owns a watersports shop, and expert in all forms of wave-chasing.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
After a nearby party member triggers a Nightsoul Burst, Mualani will gain 1 stack of Wavechaser's Exploits, which lasts for 20s. Max 3 stacks. When she uses <color=#ffd780>Boomsharka-laka</color> , Mualani will clear all Wavechaser's Exploits stacks and increase the DMG of this Boomsharka-laka by 15%/30%/45% of her Max HP based on the number of stacks cleared.
<color=#ffffff>1st Constellation</color>
The DMG dealt by the first Sharky's Surging Bite after Mualani enters Nightsoul's Blessing and the Shark Missiles it triggers is increased by 66% of Mualani's Max HP. This instance of increased DMG is subject to the diminishing DMG rules of <color=#ffd780>Surfshark Wavebreaker</color> .

customize.name: Kachina
customize.desc: A young warrior of the Nanatzcayan, given the Ancient Name of "Uthabiti." Kind-hearted and insatiably persistent, she grows stronger and more capable with each setback she faces.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
<color=#ffd780>Turbo Twirly</color> 's DMG is increased by 20% of Kachina's DEF.

customize.name: Kinich
customize.desc: A Huitztlan Saurian Hunter skilled at counting costs.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
After a nearby party member triggers a Nightsoul Burst, Kinich will gain 1 stack of Hunter's Experience that lasts 15s. Max 2 stacks. When Kinich uses <color=#ffd780>Canopy Hunter: Riding High</color> 's Scalespiker Cannon, all stacks of Hunter's Experience will be consumed, with each stack consumed increasing the DMG dealt by this Cannon shot by 320% of Kinich's ATK.

customize.name: Xilonen
customize.desc: A Name Engraver of the Nanatzcayan, she is especially skilled at finding a good balance between the heavy responsibilities of her job and living well.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Constellation</color>
After Xilonen uses <color=#ffd780>Yohual's Scratch</color> , she will grant all nearby party members the Blooming Blessing effect for 15s, dealing 65% of Xilonen's DEF as increased Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG.
<color=#ffffff>6th Constellation</color>
When Xilonen is in the Nightsoul's Blessing state and she sprints, leaps, or uses Normal or Plunging Attacks, she will gain Imperishable Night's Blessing, during which she deals 300% of her DEF as increased Normal and Plunging Attack DMG.

customize.name: Mavuika
customize.desc: The leader of Natlan who inherited the Ancient Name of "Kiongozi." She made a vow to illuminate the future of the nation of war with the Sacred Flame.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>2nd Constellation</color>
When in the Nightsoul's Blessing State, if All-Fire Armaments' form is a Flamestrider, Mavuika's Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, and her Sunfell Slice from the Elemental Burst Hour of Burning Skies deal 60%, 90%, and 120% of her ATK as increased DMG respectively.

customize.name: Citlali
customize.desc: The great shaman from the Masters of the Night-Wind, the universally-revered Granny Itztli.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>

Artifacts

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
When Normal Attacks hit opponents, there is a 36% chance that it will trigger Valley Rite, which will increase Normal Attack DMG by 70% of ATK. This effect will be dispelled 0.05s after a Normal Attack deals DMG. If a Normal Attack fails to trigger Valley Rite, the odds of it triggering the next time will increase by 20%. This trigger can occur once every 0.2s.

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
When the equipping character heals a party member, the Yearning effect will be created for 6s, which records the total amount of healing provided (including overflow healing). When the duration expires, the Yearning effect will be transformed into the "Waves of Days Past" effect: When your active party member hits an opponent with a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Plunging Attack, Elemental Skill, or Elemental Burst, the DMG dealt will be increased by 8% of the total healing amount recorded by the Yearning effect. The "Waves of Days Past" effect is removed after it has taken effect 5 times or after 10s. A single instance of the Yearning effect can record up to 15,000 healing, and only a single instance can exist at once, but it can record the healing from multiple equipping characters. Equipping characters on standby can still trigger this effect.
The <color=#ffffff>Additive Reactions</color> (Spread and Aggravate) add their own additive bonus. Their formula is calculated this way:

<color=#ffffff>Additive Base Damage Bonus = Character LVL × Reaction Multiplier ×</color>
<color=#ffffff>× (100% + EM Bonus + Reaction Bonus)</color>

The Reaction Multiplier is 115% for the Aggravate reaction, and 125% for the Spread reaction.
The EM Bonus is given in the character stats screen, and is calculated as:
<color=#ffffff>EM×5 / EM+1200</color>
There are some Reaction Bonuses for these Additive Reactions:

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged and Superconduct by 40%.

<color=#ffffff>( Character LVL+100 ) / [ ( Character LVL+100 ) +</color>
<color=#ffffff>+ ( Enemy LVL+100 )×( 100%-Enemy DEF Reduced )×( 100%-Enemy DEF Ignored ) ]</color>

The <color=#ffffff>Enemy RES Multiplier</color> is given by this table:

<color=#ffffff>Formula</color>
<color=#ffffff>RES < 0%</color>
<color=#ffffff73>100% - ( RES/2 )</color>
<color=#ffffff>0% ≤ RES < 75%</color>
<color=#ffffff73>100% - RES</color>
<color=#ffffff>RES ≥ 75%</color>
<color=#ffffff73>100% / ( 100% + RES×4 )</color>

Damage Bonus Multiplier

<color=#ffffff73>There is a general multiplier for all damage types (except for the Transformative Reactions one). There are also specific multipliers for each type of elemental damage and ability. Furthermore, there are three special multipliers: the CRIT Multiplier (when it hits critically), the Amplifying Reaction Bonus (when it triggers Vaporize or Melt) and the Damage Taken Multiplier. So the formula is calculated as:</color>

<color=#ffffff>Damage Bonus Multiplier =</color>
<color=#ffffff>= ( 100% + General DMG Bonus + Elemental DMG Bonus +</color>
<color=#ffffff>+ Ability DMG Bonus + Damage Taken Multiplier ) ×</color>
<color=#ffffff>× Amplifying Reaction Bonus × CRIT Multiplier</color>
General Damage Bonus

<color=#ffffff73>There are many effects that add a General DMG Bonus (or just DMG, or Common DMG).</color>

The DMG Lyney deals to opponents affected by <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> will receive the following buffs:
· Increases the DMG dealt by 60%.
· Each <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> party member other than Lyney will cause the DMG dealt to increase by an additional 20%.
Lyney can deal up to 100% increased DMG to opponents affected by <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> in this way.

customize.name: Furina
customize.desc: The absolute focus of the stage of judgment, until the final applause sounds.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Burst</color>
During Furina's Burst, when nearby party members' HP increases or decreases, 1 Fanfare point will be granted to Furina for each percentage point of their Max HP by which their HP changes.
At the same time, Furina will increase the DMG dealt by and Incoming Healing Bonus of all nearby party members based on the amount of Fanfare she has.

customize.name: Emilie
customize.desc: A Fontainian perfumer, one who bottles secrets.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
Emilie deals increased DMG to Burning opponents based on her ATK, with every 1,000 ATK increasing DMG dealt by 15%. The maximum DMG bonus that can be gained this way is 36%.

customize.name: Xilonen
customize.desc: A Name Engraver of the Nanatzcayan, she is especially skilled at finding a good balance between the heavy responsibilities of her job and living well.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>2nd Constellation</color>
When Xilonen's Source Samples activate, all nearby party <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> members will gain the following effect: DMG dealt +50%.

customize.name: Traveler (Pyro)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>1st Constellation</color>
While Blazing Threshold or Scorching Threshold are active, the current active character deals 6% increased DMG. If said character is in the Nightsoul's Blessing state, they will deal an additional 9% DMG.

customize.name: Mavuika
customize.desc: The leader of Natlan who inherited the Ancient Name of "Kiongozi." She made a vow to illuminate the future of the nation of war with the Sacred Flame.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension passive</color>
After using her Elemental Burst, Hour of Burning Skies, every point of Fighting Spirit present when it is used increases the DMG that the current active party member deals by 0.2%. The maximum increase obtainable this way is 40%, and this effect lasts 20s, decaying over this duration until it reaches 0.
<color=#ffffff>4th Constellation</color>
The DMG increase gained after using the Elemental Burst Hour of Burning Skies will not decay over time, and an additional 10% DMG Bonus will be gained.

customize.name: Iansan
customize.desc: Head coach of the fitness club at the Collective of Plenty, and a renowned Natlanese nutritionist.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>6th Constellation</color>
When Iansan triggers Nightsoul point restoration, if there is any overflow, she will gain the Extreme Force effect, which increases the DMG dealt by your current active character by 25% for 3s.
Weapons

customize.name: Cool Steel
customize.desc: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.

customize.text: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> .

customize.name: Dragon's Bane
customize.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

customize.text: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by <color=#37ffff>20%/24%/28%/32%/36%</color> .

customize.name: Lion's Roar
customize.desc: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.

customize.text: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by <color=#37ffff>20%/24%/28%/32%/36%</color> .

customize.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
customize.desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

customize.text: On hit, increases ATK by <color=#37ffff>3.2%/3.9%/4.6%/5.3%/6%</color> for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> .

customize.name: Skyward Pride
customize.desc: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.

customize.text: Increases all DMG by <color=#37ffff>8%/10%/12%/14%/16%</color> . After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does <color=#37ffff>80%/100%/120%/140%/160%</color> of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

customize.name: Alley Hunter
customize.desc: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.

customize.text: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by <color=#37ffff>2%/2.5%/3%/3.5%/4%</color> every second up to a max of <color=#37ffff>20%/25%/30%/35%/40%</color> . When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by <color=#37ffff>4%/5%/6%/7%/8%</color> per second until it reaches 0%.

customize.name: The Alley Flash
customize.desc: A straight sword as black as the night. It once belonged to a thief who roamed the benighted streets.

customize.text: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> . Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

customize.name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
customize.desc: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering it invulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.

customize.text: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> .

customize.name: Sharpshooter's Oath
customize.desc: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.

customize.text: Increases DMG against weak spots by <color=#37ffff>24%/30%/36%/42%/48%</color> .

customize.name: Freedom-Sworn
customize.desc: A straight sword, azure as antediluvian song, and as keen as the oaths of freedom taken in the Land of Wind.

customize.text: Increases DMG by <color=#37ffff>10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%</color> . "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" increases Normal, Charged and Plunging Attack DMG by <color=#37ffff>16%/20%/24%/28%/32%</color> and increases ATK by <color=#37ffff>20%/25%/30%/35%/40%</color> .

customize.name: Serpent Spine
customize.desc: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.

customize.text: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal <color=#37ffff>6%/7%/8%/9%/10%</color> more DMG and take <color=#37ffff>3%/2.7%/2.4%/2.2%/2%</color> more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

customize.name: The Bell
customize.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

customize.text: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to <color=#37ffff>20%/23%/26%/29%/32%</color> of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s. While protected by a shield, the character gains <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> increased DMG.

customize.name: Iron Sting
customize.desc: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.

customize.text: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by <color=#37ffff>6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12%</color> for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can occur once every 1s.

customize.name: Rainslasher
customize.desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

customize.text: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <color=#37ffff>20%/24%/28%/32%/36%</color> .

customize.name: Magic Guide
customize.desc: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-new additions based on recent developments.

customize.text: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> .

customize.name: Raven Bow
customize.desc: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.

customize.text: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> .

customize.name: Black Tassel
customize.desc: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegant solution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.

customize.text: Increases DMG against slimes by <color=#37ffff>40%/50%/60%/70%/80%</color> .

customize.name: Aqua Simulacra
customize.desc: This longbow's color is unpredictable. Under the light, it takes on a lustrous, watery blue.

customize.text: HP is increased by <color=#37ffff>16%/20%/24%/28%/32%</color> . When there are opponents nearby, the DMG dealt by the wielder of this weapon is increased by <color=#37ffff>20%/25%/30%/35%/40%</color> . This will take effect whether the character is on-field or not.

customize.name: Fading Twilight
customize.desc: A precious bow made of platinum, inlaid with an orb that shimmers with the light of eventide.

customize.text: Has three states, Evengleam, Afterglow, and Dawnblaze, which increase DMG dealt by <color=#37ffff>6%/10%/14%</color> | <color=#37ffff>7.5%/12.5%/17.5%</color> | <color=#37ffff>9%/15%/21%</color> | <color=#37ffff>10.5%/17.5%/24.5%</color> | <color=#37ffff>12%/20%/28%</color> respectively. When attacks hit opponents, this weapon will switch to the next state. This weapon can change states once every 7s. The character equipping this weapon can still trigger the state switch while not on the field.

customize.name: Toukabou Shigure
customize.desc: A rather special oil-paper umbrella. While long wanderings may make one used to the wind and the rain, there might be some fun in admiring a rainy scene beneath this parasol.

customize.text: After an attack hits opponents, it will inflict an instance of Cursed Parasol upon one of them for 10s. This effect can be triggered once every 15s. If this opponent is taken out during Cursed Parasol's duration, Cursed Parasol's CD will be refreshed immediately. The character wielding this weapon will deal <color=#37ffff>16%/20%/24%/28%/32%</color> more DMG to the opponent affected by Cursed Parasol.

customize.name: Song of Stillness
customize.desc: A strange longbow that resembles a sea creature. Its string makes no sound at all.

customize.text: After the wielder is healed, they will deal <color=#37ffff>16%/20%/24%/28%/32%</color> more DMG for 8s. This can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

customize.name: Crimson Moon’s Semblance
customize.desc: A keen-edged weapon, luster dazzling as the crimson moon. It is said that an ancient dynasty once regarded it as a ritual object that could bridge two worlds, but none still remember the beliefs and ceremonies of that bygone age.

customize.text: Grants a Bond of Life equal to 25% of Max HP when a Charged Attack hits an opponent. This effect can be triggered up to once every 14s. In addition, when the equipping character has a Bond of Life, they gain a <color=#37ffff>12%/16%/20%/24%/28%</color> DMG Bonus; if the value of the Bond of Life is greater than or equal to 30% of Max HP, then gain an additional <color=#37ffff>24%/32%/40%/48%/56%</color> DMG Bonus.

customize.name: Absolution
customize.desc: A rapier once wielded by a deceiver who had forsaken everything. In the past, it was primarily used as a tool when he had to disguise his identity.

customize.text: CRIT DMG increased by <color=#37ffff>20%/25%/30%/35%/40%</color> . Increasing the value of a Bond of Life increases the DMG the equipping character deals by <color=#37ffff>16%/20%/24%/28%/32%</color> for 6s. Max 3 stacks.

customize.name: Lumidouce Elegy
customize.desc: A magnificent polearm adorned with azure crystal. It is said to have been a certain legendary Champion Duelist's treasure — and yet, not once was it ever used.

customize.text: After the equipping character triggers Burning on an opponent or deals Dendro DMG to Burning opponents, the DMG dealt is increased by <color=#37ffff>18%/23%/28%/33%/38%</color> . This effect lasts for 8s, max 2 stacks.

customize.name: Starcaller's Watch
customize.desc: A statue carved in the shape of an eagle, a sacred relic of the Masters of the Night-Wind that has been passed down from generation to generation.

customize.text: Increases Elemental Mastery by <color=#37ffff>100/125/150/175/200</color> . Gain the "Mirror of Night" effect within 15s after the equipping character creates a shield: The current active party member deals <color=#37ffff>28%/35%/42%/49%/56%</color> increased DMG to nearby opponents. You can gain the "Mirror of Night" effect once every 14s.
Artifacts

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
Increases DMG by 30% against opponents with more than 50% HP.

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
Increases DMG against opponents affected by Electro by 35%.

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro by 35%.

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
When the value of a Bond of Life increases or decreases, this character deals 18% increased DMG for 6s. Max 3 stacks.

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
After leaving combat for 3s, DMG dealt increased by 50%. In combat, if no Burning opponents are nearby for more than 6s, this DMG Bonus will decrease by 10% per second until it reaches 0%. When a Burning opponent exists, it will increase by 10% instead until it reaches 50%. This effect still triggers if the equipping character is off-field.

<color=#ffffff>2-Piece Set</color>
While the equipping character is in Nightsoul's Blessing and is on the field, their DMG dealt is increased by 15%.
Elemental Damage Bonus
<color=#ffffff73>There are some characters who have a specific Elemental Damage Bonus as their special ascension stat:</color>
<color=#ffffff>Pyro</color>

customize.name: Klee
customize.desc: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius's confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

customize.name: Yanfei
customize.desc: A well-known legal adviser active in Liyue Harbor. A brilliant young lady in whose veins runs the blood of an illuminated beast.

customize.text: <color=#ffffff>Hydro</color>

customize.name: Tartaglia
customize.desc: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe." His name is highly feared on the battlefield.

customize.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
customize.desc: The Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. All of the island's affairs are at this young lady's fingertips.

customize.text: <color=#ffffff>Electro</color>

customize.name: Beidou
customize.desc: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

customize.text: <color=#ffffff>Cryo</color>

customize.name: Diona
customize.desc: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

customize.name: Aloy
customize.desc: Formerly an outcast, now a hunter of unparalleled skill. Ready to do the right thing at any time.

customize.text: <color=#ffffff>Anemo</color>

customize.name: Sucrose
customize.desc: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

customize.name: Shikanoin Heizou
customize.desc: A young prodigy detective from the Tenryou Commission. His senses are sharp and his thoughts are clear.

customize.name: Lynette
customize.desc: A magic assistant of few words, her emotions are as inscrutable as any cat's.

customize.text: <color=#ffffff>Geo</color>

customize.name: Albedo
customize.desc: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

customize.name: Ningguang
customize.desc: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

customize.name: Zhongli
customize.desc: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

customize.name: Gorou
customize.desc: The great general of Watatsumi Island's forces. He is deeply trusted by his subordinates.

customize.name: Kachina
customize.desc: A young warrior of the Nanatzcayan, given the Ancient Name of "Uthabiti." Kind-hearted and insatiably persistent, she grows stronger and more capable with each setback she faces.

customize.text: <color=#ffffff>Dendro</color>

customize.name: Tighnari
customize.desc: A young researcher well-versed in botany who currently serves as a Forest Watcher in Avidya Forest. He is a straight shooter with a warm heart - and a dab hand at guiding even the dullest of pupils.

customize.name: Alhaitham
customize.desc: The current scribe of the Sumeru Akademiya, a man endowed with extraordinary intelligence and talent. He lives free — free from the searching eyes of ordinary people, anyway.

customize.text: <color=#ffffff>Physical</color>

customize.name: Razor
customize.desc: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

customize.text: Weapons whose passive adds an Elemental Damage Bonus:

customize.name: Mappa Mare
customize.desc: A nautical chart featuring nearby currents and climates that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders.

customize.text: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a <color=#37ffff>8%/10%/12%/14%/16%</color> Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

customize.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
customize.desc: An educational tome written by anonymous early inhabitants who worshiped the wind. It has been blessed by the wind for its faithfulness and influence over the millennia.

customize.text: When in battle, gain a <color=#37ffff>8%/10%/12%/14%/16%</color> Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

customize.name: Skyward Atlas
customize.desc: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.

customize.text: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> .

customize.name: Calamity Queller
customize.desc: A keenly honed weapon forged from some strange crystal. Its faint blue light seems to whisper of countless matters now past.

customize.text: Gain <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> All Elemental DMG Bonus.

customize.name: Haran Geppaku Futsu
customize.desc: A famed work by the Futsu line of smiths. The name "Haran" comes from the manner in which it resembles the violent, roiling waves.

customize.text: Obtain <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> All Elemental DMG Bonus.

customize.name: The Widsith
customize.desc: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.

customize.text: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by <color=#37ffff>60%/75%/90%/105%/120%</color> . Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by <color=#37ffff>48%/60%/72%/84%/96%</color> . Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by <color=#37ffff>240/300/360/420/480</color> .

customize.name: Hakushin Ring
customize.desc: A catalyst that carries the memory of the Kitsune Saiguu of ancient times. However, this device is but an impoverished vessel for the full breadth of her thought.

customize.text: After the character equipped with this weapon triggers an Electro elemental reaction, nearby party members of an Elemental Type involved in the elemental reaction receive a <color=#37ffff>10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%</color> Elemental DMG Bonus for their element, lasting 6s. Elemental Bonuses gained in this way cannot be stacked.

customize.name: Kagura's Verity
customize.desc: The bells used when performing the Kagura Dance, blessed by the Guuji herself. The scent of the Sacred Sakura tree lingers on it.

customize.text: Gains the Kagura Dance effect when using an Elemental Skill, causing the Elemental Skill DMG of the character wielding this weapon to increase by <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> for 16s. Max 3 stacks. This character will gain <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> All Elemental DMG Bonus when they possess 3 stacks.

customize.name: Mistsplitter Reforged
customize.desc: A sword that blazes with a fierce violet light. The name "Reforged" comes from it having been broken once before.

customize.text: Gain a <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> Elemental DMG Bonus for all elements and receive the might of the Mistsplitter's Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Mistsplitter's Emblem provides a <color=#37ffff>8%/16%/28%</color> | <color=#37ffff>10%/20%/35%</color> | <color=#37ffff>12%/24%/42%</color> | <color=#37ffff>14%/28%/49%</color> | <color=#37ffff>16%/32%/56%</color> Elemental DMG Bonus for the character's Elemental Type. The character will obtain 1 stack of the Mistsplitter's Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals Elemental DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Burst (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

customize.name: Hunter's Path
customize.desc: This gilded bow was made using precious white branches. It has felled countless wicked beasts attempting to infiltrate the woods.

customize.text: Gain <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> All Elemental DMG Bonus.

customize.name: A Thousand Floating Dreams
customize.desc: The lamp illuminates the dreams that float up over a thousand nights, and in its emerald-green light flows a song of ancient days.

customize.text: Increase the equipping character's DMG Bonus from their Elemental Type by <color=#37ffff>10%/14%/18%/22%/26%</color> for each party member other than the equipping character whose Elemental Type is not the same as the latter.

customize.name: Jadefall's Splendor
customize.desc: A ritual vessel carved from jade that reflects the luster of the skies and the clear waters.

customize.text: For 3s after using an Elemental Burst or creating a shield, the equipping character can gain the Primordial Jade Regalia effect: Restore <color=#37ffff>4.5/5/5.5/6/6.5</color> Energy every 2.5s, and gain <color=#37ffff>0.3%/0.5%/0.7%/0.9%/1.1%</color> Elemental DMG Bonus for their corresponding Elemental Type for every 1,000 Max HP they possess, up to <color=#37ffff>12%/20%/28%/36%/44%</color> . Primordial Jade Regalia will still take effect even if the equipping character is not on the field.

customize.name: Flowing Purity
customize.desc: A strangely-shaped anthology of scripts. All the scripts written by Coppelius are recorded within.

customize.text: When using an Elemental Skill, All Elemental DMG Bonus will be increased by <color=#37ffff>8%/10%/12%/14%/16%</color> for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 24% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, every 1,000 HP cleared in the process will provide <color=#37ffff>2%/2.5%/3%/3.5%/4%</color> All Elemental DMG Bonus, up to a maximum of <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> . This effect lasts 15s.

customize.name: Talking Stick
customize.desc: Most people will find this obsidian-inlaid club quite convincing indeed.

customize.text: All Elemental DMG Bonus will be increased by <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> for 15s after being affected by Hydro, Cryo, Electro, or Dendro. This effect can be triggered once every 12s.

customize.name: Prospector's Drill
customize.desc: A long-handled drill that you can rarely find nowadays. It was often used in delving and in carving stones.

customize.text: When the wielder is healed or heals others, they will gain a Unity's Symbol that lasts 30s, up to a maximum of 3 Symbols. When using their Elemental Skill or Burst, all Symbols will be consumed and the Struggle effect will be granted for 10s. For each Symbol consumed, gain <color=#37ffff>7%/8.5%/10%/11.5%/13%</color> All Elemental DMG Bonus. The Struggle effect can be triggered once every 15s, and Symbols can be gained even when the character is not on the field.

customize.name: Range Gauge
customize.desc: A measuring instrument that you can rarely find nowadays. It is capable of firing arrows.

customize.text: When the wielder is healed or heals others, they will gain a Unity's Symbol that lasts 30s, up to a maximum of 3 Symbols. When using their Elemental Skill or Burst, all Symbols will be consumed and the Struggle effect will be granted for 10s. For each Symbol consumed, gain <color=#37ffff>7%/8.5%/10%/11.5%/13%</color> All Elemental DMG Bonus. The Struggle effect can be triggered once every 15s, and Symbols can be gained even when the character is not on the field.

customize.name: Peak Patrol Song
customize.desc: An obsidian blade of unparalleled sharpness, light as a song. It was modified by a certain artisan to come equipped with a record-playing detachable Phlogiston Device.

customize.text: Gain "Ode to Flowers" after Normal or Plunging Attacks hit an opponent gaining a <color=#37ffff>10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%</color> All Elemental DMG Bonus for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can trigger once per 0.1s. When this effect reaches 2 stacks or the 2nd stack's duration is refreshed, increase all nearby party members' All Elemental DMG Bonus by <color=#37ffff>8%/10%/12%/14%/16%</color> for every 1,000 DEF the equipping character has, up to a maximum of <color=#37ffff>25.6%/32%/38.4%/44.8%/51.2%</color> , for 15s.
<color=#ffffff73>Some artifacts that add an Elemental Damage Bonus:</color>

<color=#ffffff>2-Piece Set</color>
Cryo DMG Bonus +15%

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
A character equipped with this Artifact set will obtain the Curiosity effect in the following conditions: When on the field, the character gains 1 stack after hitting an opponent with a Geo attack, triggering a maximum of once every 0.3s. When off the field, the character gains 1 stack every 3s. Curiosity can stack up to 4 times, each providing 6% DEF and a 6% Geo DMG Bonus. When 6 seconds pass without gaining a Curiosity stack, 1 stack is lost.

Damage Taken Multiplier

<color=#ffffff73>Unlike the other damage multipliers, this is applied to the enemy and not to the characters.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Some characters and weapons can increase the Damage Taken by enemies:</color>

customize.name: Mona
customize.desc: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Burst</color>
Opponents trapped inside an Illusory Bubble that sustain DMG will be affected by Omen, which increase DMG taken by them.

customize.name: Ganyu
customize.desc: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Constellation</color>
Opponents standing within the AoE of <color=#ffd780>Celestial Shower</color> take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.
Increased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.
The effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

customize.name: Ororon
customize.desc: A young man from the Masters of the Night-Wind who instead lives in the wild alongside all manner of life.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>1st Constellation</color>
After the <color=#ffd780>Spirit Orb</color> hits an opponent, it will apply the Nighttide effect to them for 12s. Opponents affected by Nighttide take 50% increased DMG from Hypersense triggered by the Passive Talent, "Nightshade Synesthesia."
Amplifying Reaction Bonus

<color=#ffffff73>When the hit triggers an Amplifying Reaction, such as Vaporize or Melt, an additional multiplier is added.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>This</color> <color=#ffffff>Amplifying Reaction Bonus</color> <color=#ffffff73>is calculated as:</color>
<color=#ffffff>Reaction Multiplier × (100% + EM Bonus + Reaction Bonus)</color>

<color=#ffffff73>The Reaction Multiplier is 200% for the Vaporize reaction triggered by an Hydro hit and for the Melt reaction triggered by a Pyro hit; and 150% for the Vaporize reaction triggered by a Pyro hit and for the Melt reaction triggered by a Cryo hit.</color>

<color=#ffffff>200%</color>
<color=#ffffff>150%</color>
<color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff73>aura</color>
<color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff73>hit</color>
<color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff73>aura</color>
<color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff73>hit</color>
<color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff73>aura</color>
<color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff73>hit</color>
<color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff73>aura</color>
<color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff73>hit</color>
<color=#ffffff73>The EM Bonus is given in the character stats screen, and is calculated as:</color>
<color=#ffffff>EM×2.78 / EM+1400</color>
<color=#ffffff73>There are some Reaction Bonus for these Amplifying Reactions:</color>

<color=#ffffff>4-Piece Set</color>
Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%.

customize.name: Mona
customize.desc: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>1st Constellation</color>
When any of your own party members hits an opponent affected by an Omen, the effects of <color=#80c0ff>Hydro-related Elemental Reactions</color> are enhanced for 8s.
CRIT Multiplier
<color=#ffffff73>When the attack hits critically, the</color> <color=#ffffff>CRIT Multiplier</color> <color=#ffffff73>added is:</color>
<color=#ffffff>100% + CRIT Damage</color>
